document.full_text: children as young as eight have been sexually assaulted during the conflict between rebels trying to oust the libyan leader muammar gaddafi and forces loyal to him, a british charity said on saturday.
document.title: charity says children raped during libya conflict
lines_and_colors: children as young as eight have been sexually assaulted during the conflict between rebels trying to oust the libyan leader muammar gaddafi and forces loyal to him, a british charity said on saturday.
